hypothesis_content.title: BTC Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a Bollinger Band squeeze (20-day BB width < 0.5x its 30-day average) during NEUTRAL regime, the subsequent breakout direction with >1.5x average volume will continue for at least 3 days with 2:1 reward/risk ratio.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Compressed volatility during neutral periods often precedes significant directional moves. Volume confirmation filters false breakouts. Neutral regimes provide cleaner technical setups without strong directional bias.
entry_conditions: BTC 20-day Bollinger Band width < 0.5x its 30-day average
Price closes outside BB (upper for long, lower for short)
Volume on breakout day > 1.5x 20-day average volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: 3 ATR (14-day) from entry in breakout direction
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain >50% of initial move within 2 days or reverses to close back inside BB within 3 days.
